item.title: Ex-Trump prosecutor Jack Smith faces investigation by independent political watchdog
item.description: An independent watchdog agency responsible for enforcing a law against partisan political activity by federal employees has opened an investigation into Jack Smith, the Justice Department special counsel who brought two criminal cases against then-candidate Donald Trump before his election to the Wh
